info.name: rapidshare: de-advertize & isolate download button
info.description: This is not for the entire site, it is only meant for downloaders who only want to see the download button and not the sign up / save stuff. Dont use this style if you are a regular rapidshare user unless you plan to integrate into another style (apply multiple styles to rapidshare to do this).
info.additionalInfo:
This is version 1.0 FINAL, no more releases or corrections will be updated as it is a simplex style and was only meant to do one thing.
